tstoStore(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Add roots to store, can be a range of roots determined by the indices in 'trustAnchors' in 'cs'!!! currently no checks in place that confirm existence of a root !!!","params":{"endIndex":"Index of the last root to add","startIndex":"Index of the first root to add","storeIndex":"Index of the concerned store in 'rootStores'"}},"constructor":{"details":"Deploy endorsement database, pass address of cert database as argument","params":{"certStore":"address of referenced certificate database"}},"containsFingerprint(uint256,bytes32)":{"details":"Check if a root store contains a certain root identifier","params":{"rootID":"Identifier of the root being checked","store":"Index of the store in 'rootStores'"},"return":"true if contained, false otherwise"},"getAccountByDomain(string,uint256)":{"details":"Get an account address that is linked to 'domain' and stems from a trusted root","params":{"domain":"Domain name looked for","rootStoreIndex":"Index of trusted root store"},"return":"if valid endorsement found: (true, account address), otherwise (false, 0x)"},"getDomainByAccount(bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Get a domain name that is linked to 'account' and stems from a trusted root","params":{"account":"Account address looked for","rootStoreIndex":"Index of trusted root store"},"return":"if valid endorsement found: (true, domain name), otherwise (false, \"\")"},"getEndorsement(uint256)":{"details":"Get Endorsement by its position in 'endorsements'","params":{"index":"Position of the endorsement in 'endorsements'"},"return":"account address, domain name, certificate identifer, expiration, date of submission, root identifer, revoked"},"getEndorsementByAddress(bytes,uint32)":{"details":"Get an endorsement by its account address and position in its repective account-address store","params":{"account":"Account address of the endorsement","index":"Position in its repective account-address store"},"return":"account address, domain name, certificate identifer, expiration, date of submission, root identifer, revoked"},"getEndorsementByDomain(string,uint32)":{"details":"Get an endorsement by its domain and position in its repective domain store","params":{"domain":"Domain name of the endorsement","index":"Position in its repective domain store"},"return":"account address, domain name, certificate identifer, expiration, date of submission, root identifer, revoked"},"getEndorsementByDomainAndAccount(string,bytes,uint256)":{"details":"Get a links 'domain' and 'account' and stems from a trusted root","params":{"account":"Account address","domain":"Domain name","rootStoreIndex":"Index of the trusted root store"},"return":"true if found /false if not, index in 'endorsements'"},"getPreEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Produces the concatenation of the input variables","params":{"accountAddress":"Account address to be endorsed","certificateID":"Identifier of the certificate that is used to create the endorsement","domainName":"Domain name to be endorsed","expiration":"Expiration date of the endorsement"},"return":"The pre-endorsement byte string"},"getPreRevocation(bytes,string,uint256)":{"details":"Produces the concatenation of the input variables","params":{"accountAddress":"accountAddress Account address to be revoked","domainName":"Domain name to be revoked","expiration":"Expiration date of the endorsement"},"return":"The pre-revocation byte string"},"getRootAt(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Get the identifer of the root at position 'index' in root store at position 'store'","params":{"index":"Position of the root in the root store","store":"Position of the root store in 'rootStores'"},"return":"Roout identifer if found, 0 otherwise"},"initializeRootStore()":{"details":"Initialize a new root store, message sender becomes its owner","return":"The index of the new store in 'endorsements'"},"removeRootFromStore(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Remove root from store, can only be performed by root store owner","params":{"rootIndex":"Index of the root in 'roots' in the respective root store","storeIndex":"Index of the root store in 'rootStores'"}},"revokeEndorsement(uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Validates the revocation of an endorsement and revokes the endorsement if it is valid","params":{"index":"Position of the endorsement in 'endorsements'","signature":"Signature confirming the revocation, created with the private key used for the inital endorsement creation"}},"submitEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Validates and stores a submitted valid endorsement","params":{"accountAddress":"address of account to be endorsed","certID":"identifier of the certificate used for signing the endorsement","domainName":"address of domain name to be endorsed","expiration":"expiration date of the endorsement","signature":"signature confirming the endorsement"}},"verifyInternalEndorsement(uint256,bytes,string,bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Validation of endorsements that are not stored in the database","params":{"account":"Address of the endorsed account","certID":"Identifier of the certificate used for the endorsement creation","domainName":"Endorsed domain name","expiration":"Expiration data of the endorsement","rootStore":"Index of the root store in 'rootStores' that is validated against","signature":"Signature confirming the endorsement"},"return":"true if the endorsement is valid, false otherwise"},"verifyInternalEndorsementRevocation(bytes,string,bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"Validation of the revocation endorsements that are not stored in the database","params":{"account":"Address of the endorsed account","certID":"Identifier of the certificate used for the endorsement creation","domain":"endorsed domain name","expiration":"Expiration data of the endorsement","signature":"Signature confirming the revocation"},"return":"true if revocation is valid, false if otherwise"}},"title":"Endorsement Database"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addRootstoStore(uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Add new roots to a root store"},"constructor":"Deploy endorsement database with reference to a certificate database","containsFingerprint(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"Check if a root store contains a certain root"},"getAccountByDomain(string,uint256)":{"notice":"Get a trusted account address that is linked to 'domain'"},"getDomainByAccount(bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Get a trusted domain name that is linked to 'account'"},"getEndorsement(uint256)":{"notice":"Get Endorsement by its position index"},"getEndorsementByAddress(bytes,uint32)":{"notice":"Get an endorsement by its account address and position in its repective account-address store"},"getEndorsementByDomain(string,uint32)":{"notice":"Get an endorsement by its domain and position in its repective domain store"},"getEndorsementByDomainAndAccount(string,bytes,uint256)":{"notice":"Get a trusted endorsement linking a domain and an account"},"getPreEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the bytes string that needs to be signed for creating an endorsement"},"getPreRevocation(bytes,string,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the bytes string that needs to be signed for revoking an endorsement"},"getRootAt(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Get the root at a certain position in a root store"},"initializeRootStore()":{"notice":"Initialize a new root store"},"removeRootFromStore(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Remove a root identifier from a root store"},"revokeEndorsement(uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Revoke an endorsement stored in the database"},"submitEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Submit an endorsement to the database"},"verifyInternalEndorsement(uint256,bytes,string,bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Utility function for verifying an internal endorsement"},"verifyInternalEndorsementRevocation(bytes,string,bytes32,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Utility function for verifying the revocation an internal endorsement"}},"notice":"Central Database for validating and storing external endorsements"}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/home/friederike/tls-certificates-for-etherum/implementation/contracts/EndorsementStore.sol":"EndorsementDatabase"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/home/friederike/tls-certificates-for-etherum/implementation/contracts/ASN1DERNode.sol":{"keccak256":"0xf4ceb79c816466efced169659eafb449af8ed61c3e4d127c0bf60823aab3fb1f","urls":["bzz-raw://3014e35bfd0d06c600c99c2d31839425f13e36ff60677949a53bcbb9fba3e359","dweb:/ipfs/QmaPCj9pFxzUBaHyBWLJfbMFmEXgqHnt3NGKHVEUqDK9Jp"]},"/home/friederike/tls-certificates-for-etherum/implementation/contracts/BufferX.sol":{"keccak256":"0x3f7a4a4825b407069831bf5d7dc0baf38eb9b5312a6388d51ffaba8d843faf85","urls":["bzz-raw://84b803370f05d783e4d32c9264a20a8c6b18adb6f88ca7bb3759538ed775f034","dweb:/ipfs/QmcLSzsbUqVehbSbLFyf9kCqSyrGSfw4SnWxhucETMV1nk"]},"/home/friederike/tls-certificates-for-etherum/implementation/contracts/BytesUtils.sol":{"keccak256":"0xc94f41f72af9279419747fd6626d550360ac423a90d59613a8b0378fe8046aa6","urls":["bzz-raw://211304044c479d460bb719f560805c77666f7bb1a3241e9bfe404f1ad5b9ce97","dweb:/ipfs/QmTAQgQ6FHLYAcx9C1rgFkEeJvdAAvcVg7uPsL7ziNQHKt"]},"/home/friederike/tls-certificates-for-etherum/implementation/contracts/CertStore.sol":{"keccak256":"0x125159cee1d3711ee25d91acf8633d59a2333d3fc51b45739772972fcddea74a","urls":["bzz-raw://f6fc76b9d16ea9e945d0ab9483482a86c905649b35baba1ac2f4b8e2e698d2c8","dweb:/ipfs/QmfVrVr45nYkXPP6VL92yfjEQmUWeTCH45MSQD6ZQbY1er"]},"/home/friederike/tls-certificates-for-etherum/implementation/contracts/EndorsementStore.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfa3ad33bd2beef627fdabdb797d657af6d5b6badaa19e3c453629ee554d24ca8","urls":["bzz-raw://3d5205b3b2ea74611bb9daeb338362b2334dc1a3230dd8f743e26f753fda1eee","dweb:/ipfs/QmbcLETBJ897JZyiQb1zSNnqqiQm6MdRgSgujNspGXvw1G"]},"/home/friederike/tls-certificates-for-etherum/implementation/contracts/ModexpPrecompile.sol":{"keccak256":"0x05e160ac0b66f9bacfeeef149e49 addRootstoStore(uint256,uint256,uint256).details: Add roots to store, can be a range of roots determined by the indices in 'trustAnchors' in 'cs'!!! currently no checks in place that confirm existence of a root !!!

params.endIndex: Index of the last root to add
params.startIndex: Index of the first root to add
params.storeIndex: Index of the concerned store in 'rootStores'

constructor.details: Deploy endorsement database, pass address of cert database as argument

containsFingerprint(uint256,bytes32).details: Check if a root store contains a certain root identifier

params.rootID: Identifier of the root being checked

getAccountByDomain(string,uint256).details: Get an account address that is linked to 'domain' and stems from a trusted root
getAccountByDomain(string,uint256).return: if valid endorsement found: (true, account address), otherwise (false, 0x)

getDomainByAccount(bytes,uint256).details: Get a domain name that is linked to 'account' and stems from a trusted root
getDomainByAccount(bytes,uint256).return: if valid endorsement found: (true, domain name), otherwise (false, "")

getEndorsement(uint256).details: Get Endorsement by its position in 'endorsements'
getEndorsement(uint256).return: account address, domain name, certificate identifer, expiration, date of submission, root identifer, revoked

getEndorsementByAddress(bytes,uint32).details: Get an endorsement by its account address and position in its repective account-address store

params.index: Position in its repective account-address store

getEndorsementByAddress(bytes,uint32).return: account address, domain name, certificate identifer, expiration, date of submission, root identifer, revoked

getEndorsementByDomain(string,uint32).details: Get an endorsement by its domain and position in its repective domain store

params.index: Position in its repective domain store

getEndorsementByDomain(string,uint32).return: account address, domain name, certificate identifer, expiration, date of submission, root identifer, revoked

getEndorsementByDomainAndAccount(string,.details: Get a links 'domain' and 'account' and stems from a trusted root

params.rootStoreIndex: Index of the trusted root store

getEndorsementByDomainAndAccount(string,.return: true if found /false if not, index in 'endorsements'

getPreEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.details: Produces the concatenation of the input variables

params.certificateID: Identifier of the certificate that is used to create the endorsement

getPreRevocation(bytes,string,uint256).details: Produces the concatenation of the input variables

params.accountAddress: accountAddress Account address to be revoked

getRootAt(uint256,uint256).details: Get the identifer of the root at position 'index' in root store at position 'store'

params.index: Position of the root in the root store
params.store: Position of the root store in 'rootStores'

initializeRootStore().details: Initialize a new root store, message sender becomes its owner
initializeRootStore().return: The index of the new store in 'endorsements'

removeRootFromStore(uint256,uint256).details: Remove root from store, can only be performed by root store owner

params.rootIndex: Index of the root in 'roots' in the respective root store
params.storeIndex: Index of the root store in 'rootStores'

revokeEndorsement(uint256,bytes).details: Validates the revocation of an endorsement and revokes the endorsement if it is valid

params.signature: Signature confirming the revocation, created with the private key used for the inital endorsement creation

submitEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.details: Validates and stores a submitted valid endorsement

params.accountAddress: address of account to be endorsed
params.certID: identifier of the certificate used for signing the endorsement
params.domainName: address of domain name to be endorsed

verifyInternalEndorsement(uint256,bytes,.details: Validation of endorsements that are not stored in the database

params.certID: Identifier of the certificate used for the endorsement creation
params.rootStore: Index of the root store in 'rootStores' that is validated against

verifyInternalEndorsement(uint256,bytes,.return: true if the endorsement is valid, false otherwise

verifyInternalEndorsementRevocation(byte.details: Validation of the revocation endorsements that are not stored in the database

params.certID: Identifier of the certificate used for the endorsement creation

verifyInternalEndorsementRevocation(byte.return: true if revocation is valid, false if otherwise

addRootstoStore(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Add new roots to a root store

methods.constructor: Deploy endorsement database with reference to a certificate database

containsFingerprint(uint256,bytes32).notice: Check if a root store contains a certain root

getAccountByDomain(string,uint256).notice: Get a trusted account address that is linked to 'domain'

getDomainByAccount(bytes,uint256).notice: Get a trusted domain name that is linked to 'account'

getEndorsement(uint256).notice: Get Endorsement by its position index

getEndorsementByAddress(bytes,uint32).notice: Get an endorsement by its account address and position in its repective account-address store

getEndorsementByDomain(string,uint32).notice: Get an endorsement by its domain and position in its repective domain store

getEndorsementByDomainAndAccount(string,.notice: Get a trusted endorsement linking a domain and an account

getPreEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.notice: Get the bytes string that needs to be signed for creating an endorsement

getPreRevocation(bytes,string,uint256).notice: Get the bytes string that needs to be signed for revoking an endorsement

getRootAt(uint256,uint256).notice: Get the root at a certain position in a root store

removeRootFromStore(uint256,uint256).notice: Remove a root identifier from a root store

revokeEndorsement(uint256,bytes).notice: Revoke an endorsement stored in the database

submitEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.notice: Submit an endorsement to the database

verifyInternalEndorsement(uint256,bytes,.notice: Utility function for verifying an internal endorsement

verifyInternalEndorsementRevocation(byte.notice: Utility function for verifying the revocation an internal endorsement

userdoc.notice: Central Database for validating and storing external endorsements
